resources.string: Discover the thrilling poem application, where you can effortlessly save your creatively crafted couplets and stories. Simply press the add icon at the bottom right and write down poetic masterpiece along with its intriguing topic. Revise and update your poem at your leisure, and share it with your loved ones. Revisit past memories as you peruse the dates where you have saved your cherished poems.

Hey, Go and check out this cool application. Go to this link to download.


Link: https://github.com/Suryansh1720001/Taaveez#taaveez
